    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [var]                                   1         3
    [newline]                               5         11
    [=]                                     13        13
    ['\\n']                                 15        18
L2
    [var]                                   1         3
    [dollar]                                5         10
    [=]                                     12        12
    ['$']                                   14        16
L3
    [var]                                   1         3
    [escaped_dollar]                        5         18
    [=]                                     20        20
    ["\\$"]                                 22        25
EOF
